original_title: 阿媽的秘密─台籍「慰安婦」的故事
overview: This is Taiwan's first documentary about comfort women. The audience gets a glimpse of history as 13 "grandmothers" speak of their unspeakable past, unknown even to their family, in front of the camera.
title: A Secret Buried for 50 Years: The Story of Taiwanese "Comfort Women"
